drainERC20s(address[],address).details: Utility for returning remaining funds back to user

params.tokens: - Tokens to move out of the ZapperExecutor contract

mintMaxRToken(address,address,address).details: Utility for minting max amount of rToken. Should only be used off-chain to calculate the exact amount of an rToken that can be minted

setupApprovals(address[],address[]).details: Utility for setting up all neccesary approvals for Zap

params.spenders: - Spenders - i'th token will be approved for i'th spender
